GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_ncm: fix potential NULL ptr deref in ncm_bitrate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.165 by commit e92c70059178da751e5af7de02384b7dfadb5ec7. For more details please see the references link.
